title: Trace elements in PM2.5 shed light over Saharan dust incursions over Munich airshed in spring 2022

The influence of a prolonged Saharan Dust event across Europe and specifically in Munich (Germany) in March 2022 was detected and analyzed in detail. The event arose from a sequence...
